title: Chile becomes latest country to ban smartphone use during class
description: Chile has passed a bill outlawing the use of mobile phones and other smart devices during classes at elementary and middle schools
content:
SANTIAGO, Chile -- Chile has passed a bill outlawing the use of mobile phones and other smart devices during classes at elementary and middle schools.
The new law will take effect next year, making … [+1669 chars]
